医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
早期CPAP治疗可能会降低帕金森氏症患者的帕金森氏病风险根据今天于2025年3月2日发布的初步研究，该呼吸暂停的人患有帕金森氏病的风险增加，但如果足够及早开始，持续的阳性气道压力（CPAP）可能会降低这种风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/early-cpap-warteatment-may-readment-may-reduce-parkinsons-disease-risk-insease-risk-in-peeople-with-sleep-apnea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/early-cpap-warteatment-may-reduce-parkinsons-disease-parkinson-disease-risk-in-people-inpeople-with-sleep-apnea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c51636d7-9283-4f4d-b050-c19f00841012 Sun, 02 Mar 2025 21:50:00 -0500 Early CPAP treatment may reduce Parkinson's disease risk in people with sleep apnea
omalizumab在治疗多食品过敏方面的口服免疫疗法优于口服免疫疗法一项临床试验发现，与口服免疫疗法（OIT）相比，对Xolair销售的药物对多食物过敏（OIT）对非常少量的常见食物过敏原的患者进行了更有效的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/omalizumab-utperforms-oral-mmunotheraphy-in-treating-multi-food-allergy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/Omalizumab-Expperforms-oral-mmunotheraphy-in-treating-multi-food-food-allergy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fef0850-975C-4114-8B0B-790A2F7772937 Sun, 02 Mar 2025 21:46:59 -0500 Omalizumab outperforms oral immunotherapy in treating multi-food allergy
TFE3激活显示了抵消帕金森氏病病理学的希望这项最近的研究强调了TFE3的神经保护潜力，TFE3是一种转录因子，在抵消与帕金森氏病（PD）相关的关键病理机制方面起着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/tfe3-activation-shows-promise-formise-for-counteracting-parkinsons-disease-parthology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/tfe3-activation-shows-promise-promise-for-counteracnacting-parkinsons-disease-parthology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2DD985F0-B32B-4060-ADF2-C0633BE1083F Sun, 02 Mar 2025 21:43:00 -0500 TFE3 activation shows promise for counteracting Parkinson's disease pathology
加纳婴儿从小就体验丰富的多语言输入非洲是一个多语言大陆，许多成年人会流利地说几种语言。由波茨坦心理语言学家领导的一项研究团队的一项实证研究教授Natalie Boll-avetisyan和Paul O. Omane现在表明，这种多种语言的根源可以在婴儿期发现：在加纳，在加纳，大多数婴儿在多种语言上长大，其中大多数人与两种语言和每种常规语言的交流都接触。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/ghanaian-babies-experience-multliningual-multlityual-inputual-inputual-input-from-an-early-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/ghanaian-babies-experience-rich-multighinal-inputual-input-from-an-an-early-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=641A41A408A-CF6E-4C97-A241-B3FB1BC4995D Sun, 02 Mar 2025 21:38:36 -0500 Ghanaian babies experience rich multilingual input from an early age
圣裘德科学家发现视黄酸有选择地杀死转移性神经母细胞瘤细胞神经母细胞瘤是一种实体瘤，发生在儿童中。当高风险时，该疾病的预后较差。几十年前，将药物视网膜酸添加到神经母细胞瘤治疗中，将存活率提高了10-15％。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/st-jude-scientists-discover-discover-how-retinoic-acid-secid-selectility--kills-kills-kills-metastastic-neuroblastoma-neuroblastoma-cellsoma-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/st-jude-scientists-discover-discover-how-retinoic-acid-select--kills-kills-kills-metastastic-neuroblastoma-neuroblastoma-cellsoma-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fcd3320-bab2-4fd0-bd30-bd30-f92f632a03ec Sun, 02 Mar 2025 21:32:26 -0500 St. Jude scientists discover how retinoic acid selectively kills metastatic neuroblastoma cells
全球范围各不相同，但科学不是原因 - 新研究解释了为什么研究人员分析了96个国家饮食指南，发现用于确定部分大小的不同方法会导致最小的变化，而诸如成本和文化等区域因素比方法学更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/portion-sizes-vary-worldwide-but-science-isne28099t-the-reasone28094new-new-study-study-study-study-explains-explains-explains-why.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/portion-sizes-vary-worldwide-but-but-science-isne28099t-the-reasone28094new-study-study-study-study-sexplains-explains-explains-explains-why.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22eff16B-2A14-4217-92BD-7D123B77F6F7 Sun, 02 Mar 2025 21:29:00 -0500 Portion sizes vary worldwide, but science isn’t the reason—new study explains why
创新的AI支持，低成本设备使流式细胞术可用于临床使用莱斯大学乔治·布朗工程与计算学院的一组研究人员开发了一种创新的人工智能（AI）启用，低成本的设备，该设备将使流式细胞仪⎯一种用于使用激光束的流式细胞仪，用于分析流体中的细胞或颗粒的技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/innovative-ai-enabled-low-cost-cost-device-makes-makes-flow-cytometry-cytometry-cycy-cy-cersible-for-clinical-clinical-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/innovative-ai-enabled-low-cost-cost-device-makes-makes-flow-cytometry-cytometry-cy-cy-celible-accessible-for-clinical-lisical-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B2957D91-0E61-4996-8036-F8EB3FC6B979 Sun, 02 Mar 2025 21:27:03 -0500 Innovative AI-enabled, low-cost device makes flow cytometry accessible for clinical use
FDA警告危险产品在线出售，隐藏的活性成分无论您是想购买减肥，男性增强功能还是某些其他产品，如今，您都可以在线寻找它们，而不是在实物商店中寻找它们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/fda-warns-of-danger-danger-products-sold-online-with-hidden-active-withive-ingredients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/fda-warns-of-danger-products-sold-online-with-hidden-active-active-ingredients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d6589fb-808C-47E6-8194-412B970E2E7D Sun, 02 Mar 2025 21:12:49 -0500 FDA warns of dangerous products sold online with hidden active ingredients
研究人员发现脑肿瘤如何重编程中性粒细胞阻碍癌症治疗Wistar Institute博士Filippo Veglia博士的实验室发现了一种以前未知的机制，用于侵略性脑癌如何对癌症进行重新编程免疫系统细胞，从而实现进一步的肿瘤生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/researchers-uncover-now-brain-brain-tumors-reprogram-neutrogram-neutrophils-to-Hinder-to-Hinder-cancer-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/researchers-uncover-now-brain-brain-tumors-reprogram-neutrogram-neutrophils-to-hinder-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13049154-9acc-4512-4512-8598-263ABC5BB42B Sun, 02 Mar 2025 21:09:54 -0500 Researchers uncover how brain tumors reprogram neutrophils to hinder cancer treatment
科学家开发基于胡芦巴的纳米颗粒来增强糖尿病药物有效性研究人员探索了Fenugreek种子油的L-精氨酸负载的脂质纳米颗粒，发现它们增强了药物稳定性和生物利用度，显示出对糖尿病治疗的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/scientists-develop-felvevelok-fenugrek----- nanoparticles-to-enhance-diabetes-drug-fromeffectives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/scientists-develop-felvevelok-fenugrek----- nanoparticles-to-enhance-diabetes-diabetes-drug-effectives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=851492BE-B04B-455E-81BF-F7A054B16F0F Sun, 02 Mar 2025 21:05:00 -0500 Scientists develop fenugreek-based nanoparticles to enhance diabetes drug effectiveness
